mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into bank_money_flow ( money_flow_no, bank_transaction_no, amount, bank_card, create_time, create_by, first_time, bank_name, transfer_type, second_time, enterprise_id, account_id, enterprise_name, operation_type, manusl_automatic, first_check_by, second_check_by, cash_flow_hash, state, end_time ,memorandum ) values ( #{moneyFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankTransactionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transferType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manuslAutomatic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstCheckBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{secondCheckBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cashFlowHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} ,#{memorandum,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update bank_money_flow set money_flow_no = #{moneyFlowNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_transaction_no = #{bankTransactionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, bank_card = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, first_time = #{firstTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transfer_type = #{transferType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_time = #{secondTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manusl_automatic = #{manuslAutomatic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_check_by = #{firstCheckBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, second_check_by = #{secondCheckBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cash_flow_hash = #{cashFlowHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, money_flow_no, bank_transaction_no, amount, bank_card, create_time, create_by, first_time, bank_name, transfer_type, second_time, enterprise_id, account_id, enterprise_name, operation_type, manusl_automatic, first_check_by, second_check_by, cash_flow_hash, state, end_time from bank_money_flow where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, money_flow_no, bank_transaction_no, amount, bank_card, create_time, create_by, first_time, bank_name, transfer_type, second_time, enterprise_id, account_id, enterprise_name, operation_type, manusl_automatic, first_check_by, second_check_by, cash_flow_hash, state, end_time from bank_money_flow
select count(*) from bank_money_flow where bank_transaction_no = #{bankTransactionNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, money_flow_no, bank_transaction_no, amount, bank_card, create_time, create_by, first_time, bank_name, transfer_type, second_time, enterprise_id, account_id, enterprise_name, operation_type, manusl_automatic, first_check_by, second_check_by, cash_flow_hash, state, end_time from bank_money_flow where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND operation_type = #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select signature_publicKey as signaturePublicKey from certificate where certificate_id = ( select certificate_id from enterprise_certificate where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId});
